sentences.sContent: Brown bears are omnivorous, eating anything that they can get their paws on.
sentences.sCn: 棕熊是杂食动物，抓到什么吃什么。

remMethod.val: omni (全) + vor (吃) + ous → 全部吃的 → 杂食的

words.tran: [动] 杂食动物；不偏食的人

trans.tranCn: 杂食的；什么都读的；无所不吃的
trans.tranOther: An omnivorous person or animal eats all kinds of food, including both meat and plants
